pull_request.title: Fix #197347 iolo.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

[#197347](https://www.github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197347)

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

There are other sites using same cookie script: `https://publicwww.com/websites/%22enzuzo.com%2Fscripts%2Fcookiebar%22/`

EasyList Cookie is using `/scripts/cookiebar/*`, so please tell me if it's ok to use this rule instead.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Fix #197347 iolo.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

[#197347](https://www.github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197347)

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

The cookie only appears when using California IP address.

There are other sites using same cookie script: https://publicwww.com/websites/%22enzuzo.com%2Fscripts%2Fcookiebar%22/

EasyList Cookie is using `/scripts/cookiebar/*`, so please tell me if it's ok to use this rule instead.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
> Not reproduced on my end. Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site. If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

I did both of the things you mentioned and I still get the “please disable your adblocker for watching our videos” on everything on the site. It pops up after 10 or so seconds.

review.body:
Could you please also add `clickondetroit.com` to this rule:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/53224c2067a933629bd8fe5b0ebbe6b3e8059948/AnnoyancesFilter/Popups/sections/antiadblock.txt#L411-L412
This way even if "Admiral's" domain changes, loading it should be prevented by scriptlet.

comment.body:
На этих зеркалах не везде можно посмотреть этот фильм, а где он доступен там блокируется рекламный сервер. На вашей стороне он также начинает с `cdn-t`?
В целом лучше использовать программу вместе с AdGuard DNS, поскольку если сделать правило более широким, возможна некорректная блокировка.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://www.meijer.com/weeklyad.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.meijer.com%2Fweeklyad.html)
### Comment
> We are receiving an error at Meijer.com that just started occurring when using a browser that is behind AdGuard DNS.  The weekly ad no longer shows up on the site if we have AdGuard enabled.  While this is technically an ad, it isn't one that would ever pop up unintentionally-- you need to actually seek this out to find out what is on sale for the week, so I would label this a false positive.
Username: `@Balthanon`

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5y1de7na56gww8ow0g08g4gsckwwg4gnr4zsgj8gqs.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oubeykvwum80gs4ccsgkowkkowswgogdixtwe9qvs8.png?nc=1)
</details>

Information | Value

AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS

issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

[#197358](https://www.github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197358)

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Ok. I can reproduce the login popup by these steps (I'm using Germany IP address):

1. Set Firefox to auto clear cookies and data when closing,
2. Clear the site's cookies and data, then close Firefox,
3. Re-open Firefox and load the link by copy pasting to the URL bar. At first, it won't show the login popup,
4. Open new tab and load the link again by copy pasting it to the URL bar -> This time I can see the login popup

I can reproduce the login popup with and without the `removeparam` rules.

```
marmaracapital.com.tr##.seers-cmp-cookie-data-hol
```

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

[#197358](https://www.github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197358)

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://howdyho.net/download/1513](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhowdyho.net%2Fdownload%2F1513) ### Comment > Нужно ждать 60 секунд, чтобы файл скачался. Похоже максимум можно уменьшить до 25 секунд, чтобы при этом страница не перезагрузилась: > > ```adblock > howdyho.net#%#//scriptlet('trusted-set-attr', '#progress-value', 'data-timer', '25') > ``` > > Но есть ещё одна проблема — если пока идёт таймер, переключиться на другую вкладку, то таймер остановится, и продолжится, только когда обратно откроешь их сайт. Я попробовал убрать `webkitvisibilitychange`, и вроде это работает, но как будто не каждый раз: > > ```adblock > howdyho.net#%#//scriptlet('prevent-addEventListener', 'webkitvisibilitychange', '_nativeSwitch') > ``` > Username: `@rakleed` ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gloria-jeans.ru/xpvnsulc/?back_location=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gloria-jeans.ru%2F&hcheck=4d21a806556dae592689bb8867b7df9e&request_datetime=2025-01-30+17%3A43%3A03++0000&request_ip=188.243.24.232&request_id=3hl2jheClOs1&srv=498419f29ed52f2be2b33f4d4a945a29&copts_k=34329a5a02a9324e019a05edb52040c7981bd4ba581f7273b68d1ed943a9b54186521a1410a88e71a6b193c3c19809afc90fe2b7e6e70dedcf849e4833dc70cc&oirutpspid=1738245075043_fc4e0126b661d7f250cbf5ff86bfe92d_xjakgvtqng98ne01&oirutpspsc=1738258983357_e8b3b1be047f87b72973fefaf924378a_0afca9446907397fd82e8900a97e95e4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gloria-jeans.ru%2Fxpvnsulc%2F%3Fback_location%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.gloria-jeans.ru%252F%26hcheck%3D4d21a806556dae592689bb8867b7df9e%26request_datetime%3D2025-01-30%2B17%253A43%253A03%2B%2B0000%26request_ip%3D188.243.24.232%26request_id%3D3hl2jheClOs1%26srv%3D498419f29ed52f2be2b33f4d4a945a29%26copts_k%3D34329a5a02a9324e019a05edb52040c7981bd4ba581f7273b68d1ed943a9b54186521a1410a88e71a6b193c3c19809afc90fe2b7e6e70dedcf849e4833dc70cc%26oirutpspid%3D1738245075043_fc4e0126b661d7f250cbf5ff86bfe92d_xjakgvtqng98ne01%26oirutpspsc%3D1738258983357_e8b3b1be047f87b72973fefaf924378a_0afca9446907397fd82e8900a97e95e4) ### Comment > При включённом `Hide User-Agent` при открытии сайта вначале редиректит на старницу с капчей (например, [такую](https://www.gloria-jeans.ru/xpvnsulc/?back_location=https%3a%2f%2fwww.gloria-jeans.ru%2f&hcheck=4d21a806556dae592689bb8867b7df9e&request_datetime=2025-01-30+17%3a43%3a03+%2b0000&request_ip=188.243.24.232&request_id=3hl2jheClOs1&srv=498419f29ed52f2be2b33f4d4a945a29&copts_k=34329a5a02a9324e019a05edb52040c7981bd4ba581f7273b68d1ed943a9b54186521a1410a88e71a6b193c3c19809afc90fe2b7e6e70dedcf849e4833dc70cc&oirutpspid=1738245075043_fc4e0126b661d7f250cbf5ff86bfe92d_xjakgvtqng98ne01&oirutpspsc=1738258983357_e8b3b1be047f87b72973fefaf924378a_0afca9446907397fd82e8900a97e95e4)), но после успешного прохождения, на сайте большая часть контента не загружается. > > При этом, если просто отключить `Hide User-Agent` или добавить сайт в исключения и перезагрузить страницу, то контент всё равно не будет загружаться. Нужно либо полностью перезапустить браузер, либо отключить и включить AdGuard дополнительно, перезагрузить страницу, и тогда сайт заработает корректно. > > То есть скорее всего проблема с капчей, точно такая же проблема на: > - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/196418 > - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197286 > - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/195938 > Username: `@rakleed` ### Screenshots

issue.title: Adguard is unsuccessfully trying to resolve PTR for its own IP address
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

0.107.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

192.168.178.200

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard is unsuccessfully trying to resolve PTR for its own IP address:

2025/01/30 14:56:13.005142 [error] dnsproxy: exchange failed upstream=172.30.32.3:53 question=";200.178.168.192.in-addr.arpa.\tIN\t PTR" duration=2.006445515s err="exchanging with 172.30.32.3:53 over udp: read udp 172.30.32.1:43207->172.30.32.3:53: i/o timeout"
2025/01/30 14:56:13.005854 [error] dnsproxy: exchange failed upstream=172.30.32.3:53 question=";200.178.168.192.in-addr.arpa.\tIN\t PTR" duration=2.005628115s err="exchanging with 172.30.32.3:53 over udp: read udp 172.30.32.1:53507->172.30.32.3:53: i/o timeout"

It happens after I issue a lookup from a machine connected to the LAN:

C:\Users\user>nslookup heise.de 192.168.178.200
Server:  UnKnown
Address:  192.168.178.200

Nicht autorisierende Antwort:
Name:    heise.de
Addresses:  2a02:2e0:3fe:1001:302::
          193.99.144.80

Adguard is running in a docker container which has internet access, is able to ping the gateway, itself and the outside world:

root@a0d7b954-adguard:/$ ping 1.1.1.1
PING 1.1.1.1 (1.1.1.1): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 1.1.1.1: seq=0 ttl=59 time=12.765 ms
64 bytes from 1.1.1.1: seq=1 ttl=59 time=12.898 ms
^C
--- 1.1.1.1 ping statistics ---
2 packets transmitted, 2 packets received, 0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max = 12.765/12.831/12.898 ms
root@a0d7b954-adguard:/$ ping 192.168.178.1
PING 192.168.178.1 (192.168.178.1): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 192.168.178.1: seq=0 ttl=64 time=0.702 ms
^C
--- 192.168.178.1 ping statistics ---
1 packets transmitted, 1 packets received, 0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max = 0.702/0.702/0.702 ms
root@a0d7b954-adguard:/$ ping 192.168.178.200
PING 192.168.178.200 (192.168.178.200): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 192.168.178.200: seq=0 ttl=64 time=0.209 ms
^X^C
--- 192.168.178.200 ping statistics ---
1 packets transmitted, 1 packets received, 0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max = 0.209/0.209/0.209 ms

Is this an expected behavior or maybe a configuration issue?

Version: v0.107.56

Docker version 27.3.1, build ce1223035ac3ab8922717092e63a184cf67b493d

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
